titles.title: Administrative Enforcement Fairness Act of 2022
Administrative Enforcement Fairness Act of 2022
A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to permit certain defendants to remove administrative proceedings to Federal court.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Administrative Enforcement Fairness Act of 2022
This bill allows an administrative proceeding brought under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to be removed to the appropriate federal district court.
